item.title: Report E-2025010194
item.description:
Report E-2025010194

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-18
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 22:39 EST on 12/18, XPO-BIN contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of "Methyl Ethyl Ketone" from 2 boxes of an unknown amount of 1qt cans. The boxes were punctured by a forklift during dock operations at BIN. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the material with terminal-issued PPE. No absorbent was necessary.

item.title: Report X-2025010609
item.description:
Report X-2025010609

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-09
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the INDH location a fiberboard box with signs of a release was found. The fiberboard box contained four one gallon plastic bottles and the cap came off one and spilled it's contents. The shipmnet was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025010568
item.description:
Report X-2025010568

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-22
  • City: GARY
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1488000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Train 6K4B323 derailed 8 cars at milepost CP 500. The derailment involved tank car NATX301714. The derailment caused the BOV nipple to be sheared off. The BOV remained closed but product bypassed the valve. The valve opening was plugged to stop the leak.
